data.comment: The big names in today's match at Kenilworth Road have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Kenilworth Road.
In the minute 17, Goal! Luton have got their heads in front thanks to a Glen Rea strike.
Luton's Ryan Tunnicliffe has been booked in Luton.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
The away team have replaced Han-Noah Massengo with Famara Diedhiou. This is the first substitution made today by Dean Holden.
Own goal in Luton! Sonny Bradley scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
In the minute 64, Kazenga LuaLua is replacing Ryan Tunnicliffe for the home team.
Luton make their second substitution with Dan Potts replacing Ruddock Pelly.
Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 73, Antoine Semenyo for Bristol City has been booked by Gavin Ward and receives a first yellow card.
Dean Holden is making the team's second substitution at Kenilworth Road with Adrian Mariappa replacing Jack Hunt.
Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a third substitution, with Jordan Clark replacing Harry Cornick.
In the minute 88, Sam Bell is on a sub for Nahki Wells for Bristol City.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
